segments.text: All right . But these are black and I don ’ t like black shoes . They ’ re dull .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , black is a better color than pink . Pink ’ s for girls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then why are you wearing black shoes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because ... oh , all right . You win . Let ’ s pay for them and go .
segments.speaker: S2
